name: The Town of Seaweed
description:
Welcome!

The Town of Seaweed is a lovely little life sim, you are not a farmer, though I do get inspiration from those types of games.

The Town of Seaweed  currently  has these features

12 lovely towns beings  you can interact with

Work for  with the towns beings

A currently small forest

Flowers!

Quests Tasks to take

A placeholder crafting system

A time & weather cycle 

Lovely Seasonal Shifts

&

probably a thing or two I've forgotten to mention!

----------------------------------------------

The Town of Seaweed will have

At least 19 towns (and town adjacent) beings you can befriend & romance!

Polyamory

An actual crafting system

Events

Festivals!!

More quests tasks

House expansions/renovations

More jobs

And More!

Controls

Arrow keys - move     ---     shift - dash

z, space, enter - action

x, esc - cancel   ---   x, esc - menu
